backstories.clan_founder: m_c is one of the founding members of the Colony.
backstories.clanborn: m_c was born into the Colony where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: m_c was born into the Colony, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Colony.
backstories.halfclan2: m_c was born in another the Colony, but chose to come to this Clan to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: m_c was born into the Colony, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outcast that belongs to no Colony.
backstories.outsider_roots2: m_c was born outside the Colony, but came to live in the Colony with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: m_c joined the Colony by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: m_c used to live in a popular national park, but mostly stayed away from Twolegs. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Colony life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.loner3: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone.
backstories.loner4: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone - until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found someone that made the Colony feel like home.
backstories.kittypet1: m_c joined the Clan by choice after living life with Twolegs as a kittypet.
backstories.kittypet3: m_c used to be a tubemole {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.kittypet4: m_c used to be a tubemole. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the belly of a monster. The Twolegs then left {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to fend for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}.
backstories.rogue1: m_c joined the Colony by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: m_c used to live in a Twolegplace, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Clan might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: m_c used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.abandoned1: m_c was found by the Colony as a pup and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: m_c was born outside of the Colony, but was brought to the Colony as a pup and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: m_c was born into another Clan, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a kit for the Clan to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: m_c was found and taken in after being displaced by Twolegs as a pup.
backstories.otherclan1: m_c was born into another Colony, but came to this Colony by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: m_c was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Colony and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: m_c's Clan stayed with the Clan after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Clan returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: m_c grew up in another Clan, but chose to leave that life and join the Clan {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: m_c was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: m_c was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Clan for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: m_c once was a queen in another Colony but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.disgraced4: m_c once was a worker in another Colony but was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Colony for not contributing enough.
backstories.retired_leader: m_c used to be the queen of another Colony before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after leadership became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head consort take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: m_c was once a harvester mole in another Colony.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: m_c was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Colony, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: m_c came to this Colony after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Colony and the sadistic queen that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: m_c used to live as an interloper, but after another colony chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} territory, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found refuge in the Colony.
backstories.refugee3: m_c used to be a tubemole, but joined the Clan after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel Twoleg.
backstories.refugee4: m_c used to be in an interloper group, but joined the Colony after fleeing from the group's tyrannical queen.
backstories.refugee5: m_c got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Colony here.
backstories.refugee6: m_c used to be a testrat, but joined the Colony, sick and weak after finding {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way out.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to m_c's previous Colony {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: m_c used to be part of an interloper group, but joined the Colony after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: m_c used to be a testrat, but joined the Colony after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} captive colony.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: m_c used to be an outcast, but joined the Colony after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: m_c used to wander, providing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} insight when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Clan.
backstories.wandering_healer2: m_c used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wanted it, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Clan.
backstories.guided1: m_c used to be a tubemole, but molerat after dreaming of glowing-whiskered molerats, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Colony.
backstories.guided2: m_c used to live a rough life as an interloper. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a luminescent series of tunnels, and followed them to the Colony.
backstories.guided3: m_c used to live as an outcast. A glowing-whiskered molerat appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Colony.
backstories.guided4: m_c used to live in a different Colony, until a sign from The Eternal Colony told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: m_c was found with a deceased parent. The Colony took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: m_c was found with a deceased parent. The Colony took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: m_c was found as a pup among the wreckage of a Monster with no family in sight and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned4: m_c was found as a pup hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned5: m_c was found as a pup hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} caretakers' bodies and got brought to live in the Clan.
backstories.orphaned6: m_c was found flailing on the surface as a teeny pup, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: m_c was born outside of a Colony.
backstories.outsider2: m_c was born outside of a Colony, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Colony.
backstories.outsider3: m_c was born outside of a Colony, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
